document.docAuthor: Volynkin, Anton V. & László, Gyula M.
document.masterDocTitle: On the taxonomy of the genus Tumicla Wallengren, 1863 with description of two new species from Mozambique (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On the taxonomy of the genus Tumicla Wallengren, 1863 with description of two new species from Mozambique (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tumicla wallengren, 1863
, Wiener entomologische Monatschrift 7 (5): 146, 147. Type species:
Setina sagenaria wallengren, 1860
.

=
Asuroides Durante, 2008
, Zootaxa 1713: 55. Type species:
Setina sagenaria wallengren, 1860
.

Tumicla arktos Volynkin & László
, sp. nov.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Present publication. Type locality: Mozambique , Maputo Special Reserve, West Gate , ( Sand Thicket ),
22 m
, 26°30'14.2''S , 32°42'59.6''E .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tumicla atricraspeda ( Hampson, 1914 )
,
comb. nov.

Asura atricraspeda Hampson, 1914
,
Catalogue of the Lepidoptera Phalaenae in the British Museum. Supplement Volume 1. Catalogue of the Amatidae and Arctiadae ( Nolinae and Lithosianae) in the collection of the British Museum.
Suppl., Vol. 1: 766, pl. 40, fig. 7. Type locality:
Gold Coast
[ Ghana ], Bibinaha, 700 ft .

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Asuroides calimerae Durante, 2008
, Zootaxa 1713: 59, figs 7, 25. Type locality: Senegal , Sedhiou .

subSubSection.paragraph:

,
comb. nov.

Asura congoensis Kühne, 2007
,
Esperiana Memoir
3: 361, figs 26, 27, 123, 124. Type locality: [Democratic Republic of Congo, Province Orientale], Uele, Paulis [Isiro].

comb. nov.

, Zootaxa 1713: 60, figs 6, 24. Type locality:
Democratic Republic of Congo
, W Kivu , South Lowa District, Lowowo Valley, 4000 ft .

3: 363, figs 35, 36, 133, 134. Type locality: Ghana, near Sunyani.]

,

,

française, Fort Crampel.

comb. nov.

,
comb. nov.

Asuroides rubea Durante, 2008
, Zootaxa 1713: 65, figs 11, 12, 13, 21, 29. Type locality: South Africa, Gauteng, Johannesburg, 6000 ft .

,
comb. nov.

, 16(3): 99. Type locality: [Democratic Republic of Congo], P.N.A. [Parc National Albert], Ruwenzori Massif, Kalonge, 2210 m .

Setina sagenaria Wallengren, 1860
, Wiener entomologische Monatschrift 4(2): 46. Type locality: [South Africa], Caffraria.

,
comb. nov.

, Zootaxa 1713: 67, figs 14, 15, 17, 22, 30. Type locality: Kenya, Kibwezi.

Tumicla tsonga Volynkin & László
,
sp. nov.

15 m
, 26°26'58.6''S , 32°55'29.8''E .
